data.message: Eminem, my calling is or I"m by proffession governess and half"nurse"  or old people"s home halfnurse or carenurse. I had "and have" my heart ALL the TIME for. (from my life beginning). AND/BUT I learned the boths jobs in school, too.  EMINEM, in 2003 in my HOLIDAY in AMERICA , I get a present !!! 2 cd"s (your cd"s, EMINEM OLDSCHOOL) and 1 DMX cd, too. I miss You. "Ania". (I had a bad accident in 1988 on MADONNA Birthday). I thing about You every DAY, and I love your pictures with YOUR DOUGHTER together (as child) to see;  WHEN You SHE or She You full in love hold.  Bye, bye. Have a nice day.
